Package com.intellij.notification

Interface Notifications

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NotificationsAdapter, NotificationsConfiguration, NotificationsConfigurationImpl

    public interface Notifications
    Manage and show top-level notifications.

    Use Notifications.Bus.notify(Notification) or Notifications.Bus.notify(Notification, Project) (when Project is known) to show notification.

    See Notifications.
